resources.string:
### v1.1.2:
 - Fixed styles bar not showing for emulators
 - Updated notes styles (fixed styles in lists and added tasks lists)
 - Add encryption to local database
 - Layout improvements
 ### v1.1.1:
 - Fixed stylesbar crash
 - Replaced in app rate with playstore link
 - Fixed categories deleting
 - Layout improvements
 ### v1.1.0:
 - Added Notes sync with Firestore
 - Added Note save confirmation
 - Fixed keyboard showing above task add sheet
 ### v1.0.2:
 - Added About screen
 - Fixed category deletion in Note add screen
 - Fixed force dark mode issues
 ### v1.0.1:
 - Improved Reminders alarms
 - Added Categories deletion option (Long press on category to delete)
 - Improved Notes styling (Styling selected text)
 - UI improvements
 ### v1.0.0:
 - First Release
